trans-unit.source: Defines row-specific properties that apply to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Definisce le proprietà specifiche della riga che si applicano a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementi.

trans-unit.source: You must set a RowDefinition for each row in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario impostare un RowDefinition per ogni riga in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: When you set a row-specific RowDefinition, you assign unique sizing properties to each row.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta una RowDefinition specifiche della riga, assegnare le proprietà di ridimensionamento univoco a ogni riga.

trans-unit.source: To set a group of RowDefinition elements by using code, add the RowDefinition to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare un gruppo di elementi RowDefinition tramite codice, aggiungere RowDefinition a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The RowDefinition class exposes only height properties.
trans-unit.target: La classe RowDefinition espone solo le proprietà di altezza.

trans-unit.source: To set width properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare le proprietà di larghezza di un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>creare un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the calculated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta l'altezza calcolata del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valore ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valore, che a sua volta ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the ActualHeight of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementi e le proprietà ActualHeight di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the calculated height in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'altezza calcolata in DIP (device independent pixel).</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> element, or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> value of a row that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'altezza calcolata di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref> elemento o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> valore di una riga che è definita dal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> is <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>è <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> </xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the Height value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valore ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valore, che a sua volta ha la precedenza rispetto al valore di altezza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> that represents the height of the row.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> che rappresenta l'altezza della riga.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che rappresenta l'altezza massima di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the MaxHeight value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valore ha la precedenza sul valore MaxHeight, che a sua volta ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # valori XAML *doppie* rappresentazione di stringa di un valore maggiore o uguale a `0.0034` ma uguali o minori di `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Un valore non qualificato viene misurato in DIP (device independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *doppie* valore come descritto in precedenza, (ad eccezione di `Auto`) seguito da uno degli identificatori di unità seguenti: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(impostazione predefinita) è [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` pollici; in 1 = = 96px `cm` centimetri; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` punti; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the maximum height.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'altezza massima.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum allowable height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che rappresenta l'altezza minima consentita di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the MinHeight value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizzano questi valori nello stesso esempio di codice, il valore MinHeight assume la precedenza il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valore, che a sua volta ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiungono o rimuovono righe o colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>per tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementi e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementi diventa zero fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # valori XAML *doppie* rappresentazione di stringa di un valore maggiore o uguale a `0.0034` ma uguali o minori di `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Un valore non qualificato viene misurato in DIP (device independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Le stringhe non devono includere decimali in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *doppie* valore come descritto in precedenza, (ad eccezione di `Auto`) seguito da uno degli identificatori di unità seguenti: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(impostazione predefinita) è [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` pollici; in 1 = = 96px `cm` centimetri; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` punti; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the minimum allowable height.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'altezza minima consentita.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta il valore di offset di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the row.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'offset della riga.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.
